name: Wraith
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t silvered
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.Incorporeal Movement: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
